channel.title: 667 different shop, same item, different prices
channel.description:
ok so basically, i have vestas in the pkp shop for i think 500 pkp... And what i want is vestas to be in the pkp shop for 500, and then the same item in the donator shop for 20. How would i do this? I think it would be in shop.java and itd be something like
if shop=12 case: "13887" case: "13893" return: 20
I think it would be something like that but i do not know the exact code.. Any help would be greatly appreciated! Thanks in advance.

item.title: 667 different shop, same item, different prices
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“adamgulka, post:3, topic:542127”][quote author=matzie link=topic=661001.msg4418828#msg4418828 date=1397405595]

case ITEM_ID: if (SHOP_ID==PKP_SHOP) return 500; else if (SHOP_ID==DONOR_SHOP) return 20; else return DEFAULT_ITEM_PRICE;
[/quote]

Can you add my skype and help me out? .
skype: adam.122333[/quote]
Read the rules before you post. I do not have a skype.

Read full topic
item.source: 667 different shop, same item, different prices

@adamgulka wrote:

ok so basically, i have vestas in the pkp shop for i think 500 pkp…
And what i want is vestas to be in the pkp shop for 500, and then the same item in the donator shop for 20.
How would i do this?
I think it would be in shop.java and itd be something like

if shop=12

case: "13893"
return: 20
